modName: Liliths Obliterator - Custom Battleaxes Waraxes Maces
summary: This mod is a remake of my earlier mod Lilith\'s Decapitator. The mod contains 9 different axes that have different sizes and shapes so that everyone should be able to find the one they want. Now with 3.0 includes 34 different weapons!
descriptionHtml:
Got problems, advice or ideas? Make a comment! All feedback is very welcome.

Updates:
-------------
3.0 update:
----------------
- Adds an new version of the weapons into the game called Lilith\'s Ancient Obliterator that has darker textures, shine and glowing edges. These weapons have slightly higher attack than the normal ones. You will need to upgrade the basic version with of the weapon with 5 daedra hearts to get the ancient version

- Adds a new mace Lilith\'s Evening Star both 1h and 2h. Upgradable to ancient

- Vampire dust removed from crafting ingredients


2.1: this is a pretty big update

- texture tweaks (better handle and blade)

- 5 new mace versions added

With this update this mod includes 15 new weapons!


Lilith\'s Obliterator - Custom Battleaxe and Waraxe
-----------------------------------------------------

[youtube]UWEgwIrUJ_8[/youtube] 

Starts at 4:38  
[youtube]mTxzy7sjM9o[/youtube]
Starts at 4:23

Description:
- - - - - - - -
Latest version: 2.1

.....................................................................................................................................
This weapon is part of a Weapon set \"Lilith\'s Tools\"
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


Lilith\'s Disemboweler - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14906]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Reaver -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15969]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Sickle - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22368]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Carver - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22930]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Obliterator - This mod

(Lilith\'s Razor - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11908]Link[/url])

(Lilith\'s Cleavers - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12458]Link[/url])

(Lilith\'s Decapitator - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13416]LInk[/url])

More weapons coming up including dagger and more! Even maybe an armor set when the stars are aligned!
......................................................................................................................................
This mod is a remake of my earlier mod Lilith\'s Decapitator. The mod contains 9 different axes that have different sizes and shapes so that everyone should be able to find the one they want.

The Battleaxes:

All of the battleaxes have the base damage of 28. Otherwise the stats match daedric battleaxe (base damage 25).


Lilith\'s Obliterator: The regular version. Quite large.


Lilith\'s Obliterator (Big): Same as the regular but just with a HUGE blade.


Lilith\'s Obliterator (Sm): Realistic size, about the same size as Daedric Battleaxe


Lilith\'s Obliterator (2e): Regular version with 2 edges. It\'s big :D


Lilith\'s Obliterator (2eSm): Realistic size of the 2-edged version. 

The Waraxes:

All of the waraxes have the base damage of 18. Otherwise the stats match daedric waraxe (base damage 15).

Lilith\'s Obliterator (1h): The regular waraxe. Quite large as well


Lilith\'s Obliterator (1hSm): Realistic version of the regular one.


Lilith\'s Obliterator (1hcho): A Chopper special version. Huge :P


Lilith\'s Obliterator (1h2eSm): A 2-edged version of the (1hSm). 

The 1-h maces:

All of the 1-h maces have the base damage of 19. Otherwise the stats match daedric mace (base damage 16).


Lilith\'s Obliterator (mace1h): a mace with realisitic size.


Lilith\'s Obliterator (mace1hbig): Bigger 1-handed mace


the 2-h maces:

All of the 2-h maces have the base damage of 30. Otherwise the stats match daedric battlehammer (base damage 27).

Lilith\'s Obliterator (mace2h): Quite big 2-handed mace.


Lilith\'s Obliterator (mace2hsm): A 2-handed mace with more ralistic size


Lilith\'s Obliterator (mace2hhal): A pretty big 2-handed mace with a long handle

The weapon is crafted through daedric smithing with 5 ebony ingots, 5 daedra hearts, 10 leather strips and 3 vampire dusts. 

OR 

Use the console:

1. Type \"help lilith\". This gives you the ID list.

2.Use \"Player.additem *id* *amount*\" command (without the *)
author: wiikki
